subject: Baseball
Friendship
lead_paragraph: At Class A Greensboro in 1992, Jorge Posada and Andy Pettitte were impressed with their teammate Derek Jeter, a 156-pound kid who was a first-round draft choice.
snippet: At Class A Greensboro in 1992, Jorge Posada and Andy Pettitte were impressed with their teammate Derek Jeter, a 156-pound kid who was a first-round draft choice.
